description:
Is Facebook Marketing totally confusing you? Are you wondering how to use Facebook ads to actually build your mailing list and sell more books?

Are You a Self Published Author Who Needs Serious Help Using Facebook to Actually Sell Your Books?

If so, I've got great news for you!

As a 6-figure, best-selling self published author myself, I've learned the ins and outs of Facebook marketing for authors. And guess what? It's not just about running ads!

To effectively use Facebook for marketing, you need three things:

  • A raving fan base that recommends your books to everyone they know
  • Engagement with your fans so they connect with you on a deeper level
  • The ability to run good Facebook ads that get people to click and BUY

All three of these factors are critical, but how do you accomplish them? What if you're brand new with NO FANS? How do you get fans, and better yet, how do you get TARGETED fans for your genre of books?

This course will teach you from start to finish HOW to get the right fans, engage them and then market for new fans!

The course is simple, to the point and direct. No need to be forced to watch weeks of videos, right? You want the meat of the information so you can start NOW!

So, click the TAKE THIS COURSE button at the top right hand side of this page and start learning in just a few minutes!
title: Facebook Marketing and Ads for Beginners
